column4: here's a question.. My desktop locked up and I had to restart.. now my apt-get doesn't work.. complains that "E: Could not get lock on /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
is something else that uses it open?  like the updater in the taskbar?
if you didn't change anything, then it's :0
I changed all kinds of stuff ;0
